Author: sama
Title: [Bay Area] Loopt is hiring great people who love location (funded by YC, Sequoia, and NEA)
Content: Come work at a world-changing company--the context of location lets us do really exciting things.  The company is at a stage where every individual still sets the strategy, but is far enough along everything you do has real impact.
